question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service-v2/src/live_data_service/in_memory_cache.rs] [Function: get_data()] [Version 0 handling] Can requesting version 0 cause issues with arithmetic or special case handling? (Low)

(High)
